workflows.name: Initialize Live Tracking
workflows.description: Initialize the live tracking data and start the refresh interval. Set up a 15-second interval to simulate live updates by randomly updating vehicle positions, speeds, and statuses.

workflows.name: Clear Tracking Interval
workflows.description: Clear the tracking interval when the page unloads

markers.code: return [{ name: context.item.data.name, lat: context.item.data.location.lat, lng: context.item.data.location.lng }]

en.code: return context.item.data.challans && context.item.data.challans.length > 0 ? context.item.data.challans.length + ' challan(s) detected' : 'No challans detected'
return context.item.data.challans && context.item.data.challans.length > 0 ? context.item.data.challans.length + ' challan(s) detected' : 'No challans detected'

interactions.name: Set Parked Filter
interactions.description: Sets the filter to show only parked vehicles

interactions.name: Set Grid View
interactions.description: Sets the view mode to grid

interactions.name: Set On Trip Filter
interactions.description: Sets the filter to show only vehicles on trip

interactions.name: Set All Filter
interactions.description: Sets the filter to show all vehicles

interactions.name: Update Search Query
interactions.description: Updates the search query variable when input changes

default.placeholder: Search by vehicle ID or customer name

interactions.name: Set List View
interactions.description: Sets the view mode to list

interactions.name: Set Idle Filter
interactions.description: Sets the filter to show only idle vehicles

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(10px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }

interactions.name: Open Vehicle Details
interactions.description: Opens the vehicle details popup for the selected vehicle

interactions.name: Set Stopped Filter
interactions.description: Sets the filter to show only stopped vehicles

en.code: return context.component?.variables?.['vehicleDetails'] && context.component?.variables?.['vehicleDetails'].challans && context.component?.variables?.['vehicleDetails'].challans.length > 0 ? context.component?.variables?.['vehicleDetails'].challans.map(c => 'ID: ' + c.id + ' - ' + c.amount + ' - ' + new Date(c.date).toLocaleDateString()).join('\n') : 'No challans detected'

return context.component?.variables?.['vehicleDetails'] && context.component?.variables?.['vehicleDetails'].challans && context.component?.variables?.['vehicleDetails'].challans.length > 0 ? context.component?.variables?.['vehicleDetails'].challans.map(c => 'ID: ' + c.id + ' - ' + c.amount + ' - ' + new Date(c.date).toLocaleDateString()).join('\n') : 'No challans detected'
